item.title: Microsoft.CodeCoverage v17.8 Released with New dotnet-coverage Tool and Other Improvements
item.description: Microsoft recently revealed an upgraded version of its developer tools, version 17.8.0, introducing significant improvements to Microsoft.CodeCoverage tools. Notably, the update includes the introduction of the dotnet-coverage tool. Additional enhancements comprise new report formats, an auto-merge tool, performance upgrades, and improved documentation.
item.author: (Almir Vuk)
